title: Jouzetsu Na Shichakushitsu
alternative_title: 把愛寵壞 ; 饒舌な試着室 ; 饒舌的試衣間 ; A Talkative Fitting Room
status: 把愛寵壞 ; 饒舌な試着室 ; 饒舌的試衣間 ; A Talkative Fitting Room
description:
Description :
        For his coming-of-age ceremony, our 20-year-old protagonist goes to the tailor frequented by his father to make his first suit. His disdain of suits is changed by what this first class tailor tells him: "Usually, when women dress up, they'd have to reveal some skin to appear sexy. But for men, it is the opposite. Suits increase the allure of men by acting as a packaging that contains desire." He accidentally finds out that the tailor has a crush on his father. From then on, he is further intrigued by the older tailor. He gradually discovers that the 38-year-old is changing him in more ways than one.
